column1: 4.2.3.4	  Urodynamics  The role of urodynamics in SUI evaluation remains poorly defined and is still under debate.
Preoperative urodynamic testing in women with uncomplicated, clinically demonstrable, SUI does not   improve surgical outcome for SUI.
There is no consistent correlation between urethral function tests and subsequent success or failure of   SUI surgery.
There is no consistent evidence that preoperative DO is associated with surgical failure of MUS in   women.
